members.docComment:
/**
 * Creates a client-side {@link StepHandler} that sends Cloudflare KV effects as JSON to a remote server endpoint for execution.
 *
 * Each effect is sent as a POST request to `{baseUrl}/mvfm/execute` with the contract hash, step index, path, and effect payload.
 *
 * @param options - Configuration for the client handler.
 *
 * @returns A {@link StepHandler} that tracks step indices.
 */
members.name: clientHandler
ClientHandlerOptions
baseUrl
contractHash
fetch
headers
ClientHandlerState
stepIndex

members.docComment:
/**
 * Cloudflare KV plugin factory. Namespace: `cloudflare-kv/`.
 *
 * Creates a plugin that exposes get, put, delete, and list methods for building Cloudflare KV AST nodes.
 *
 * @param config - A {@link CloudflareKvConfig} with namespaceId.
 *
 * @returns A {@link PluginDefinition} for the cloudflare-kv plugin.
 */
members.name: cloudflareKv

members.docComment:
/**
 * Cloudflare KV client interface consumed by the handler.
 *
 * Abstracts over the actual KVNamespace binding so handlers can be tested with mock clients.
 */
members.name: CloudflareKvClient
delete
get
getJson

 * Configuration for the cloudflare-kv plugin.

 * Identifies which KV namespace to operate against.

namespaceId

members.docComment:
/**
 * Generator-based interpreter fragment for cloudflare-kv plugin nodes.
 *
 * Yields `cloudflare-kv/api_call` effects for all 5 operations. Each effect contains the operation name, parameters, and namespace ID.
 */
members.name: cloudflareKvInterpreter

 * Matches the subset of the `KVNamespace` type from `@cloudflare/workers-types` that this plugin uses. Avoids a direct dependency on the types package.
 */
members.name: KVNamespaceLike

members.docComment:
/**
 * Creates a unified evaluation function that evaluates an AST against a Cloudflare KV client using the provided interpreter fragments.
 *
 * @param client - The {@link CloudflareKvClient} to execute against.
 *
 * @param fragments - Generator interpreter fragments for evaluating sub-expressions.
 *
 * @returns An async function that evaluates an AST node to its result.
 */
members.name: serverEvaluate

members.docComment:
/**
 * Creates a server-side {@link StepHandler} that executes Cloudflare KV effects against a real KV client.
 *
 * Handles `cloudflare-kv/api_call` effects by delegating to the appropriate client method based on the operation field.
 *
 * @param client - The {@link CloudflareKvClient} to execute against.
 *
 * @returns A {@link StepHandler} for void state.
 */
members.name: serverHandler

members.docComment:
/**
 * Wraps a Cloudflare Workers KVNamespace binding into a {@link CloudflareKvClient}.
 *
 * @param kv - A KVNamespace binding from the Workers runtime.
 *
 * @returns A {@link CloudflareKvClient} adapter.
 */
members.name: wrapKVNamespace
